flavor: "Damn, I'm good."
printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip.

flavor: All roads lead to Rome.
printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, after breaching Archives, breach HQ, then breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ or R&D during these breaches.
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, after breaching Archives, breach HQ, then breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ or R&D during these breaches.

flavor: "Worth it."
printed_text:
Trash your grip.
Gain 10[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Trash your grip. Gain 10 credits.

printed_text: +1[mu] [interrupt] → Once per turn, when you would play or install a card, you may trash 1 card from your grip to lower the play or install cost by 2. Limit 1 console per player. Errata from CR 1.4
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Interrupt -> Once per turn, when you would play or install a card, you may trash 1 card from your grip to lower the play or install cost by 2. Limit 1 console per player. Errata from CR 1.4

printed_text:
Whenever the Corp creates a server, he or she loses 1[credit].
Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash Hijacked Router to force the Corp to lose 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp creates a server, he or she loses 1 credit. Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash Hijacked Router to force the Corp to lose 3 credits.

flavor: ... clack... clack... clack...
printed_text: This program gets -1 strength for each card in your grip. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of code gate subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: This program gets -1 strength for each card in your grip. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of code gate subroutines.

flavor: Another man's treasure.
printed_text: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. click, 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.

flavor: "You think you're the first to come after me?"
printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, draw 2 cards and take 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, draw 2 cards and take 1 tag.

flavor: "We have you surrounded! For real, this time."
printed_text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, gain 9[credit] and take 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, gain 9 credits and take 1 tag.

printed_text: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1 credit and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor:
"With the rise of crypto, banking has become much more complicated. Financial crime has not only kept pace, but exploded exponentially."
-After the Flash: A History of the War-That-Wasn't
printed_text:
Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1[credit] from the bank on Bankroll.
[trash]: Take all credits from Bankroll.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 credit from the bank on Bankroll. trash: Take all credits from Bankroll.

flavor:
"Any piece of ice is really just a paywall."
-Liza Talking Thunder
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, the Corp gains 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, the Corp gains 2 credits.

flavor: A classy alibi.
printed_text: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.

flavor: "If I can't kill it, I know who can."
printed_text:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her.
Use these credits to trash installed cards.
stripped_printed_text: Place 12 credits from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her. Use these credits to trash installed cards.

printed_text: Whenever you breach R&D, you and the Corp secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Corp spent the same number of credits, access 1 additional card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you breach R&D, you and the Corp secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Corp spent the same number of credits, access 1 additional card.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
The Corp may look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
Reveal the top 4 cards of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. The Corp may look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Reveal the top 4 cards of R&D.

printed_text: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on this hardware. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of R&D during this breach. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on this hardware. click, 3 hosted power counters: Breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of R&D during this breach. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "What are you making?" "What aren't I making?"
printed_text: The first time you trash an accessed card each turn, you may place power counters on Mâché equal to that card's trash cost. 3 hosted power counters: Draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you trash an accessed card each turn, you may place power counters on Mache equal to that card's trash cost. 3 hosted power counters: Draw 1 card.

flavor: "Running is all methaphor, all symbols and plumbing into the depths of the psyche. Sometimes that means tentacles." -Akiko Nisei
printed_text: 2[credit]: Host this program on a piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on host sentry. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits: Host this program on a piece of ice. Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 subroutines on host sentry. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor: The journey is its own reward.
printed_text:
Install Kyuban only on a piece of ice.
Gain 2[credit] whenever you pass host ice.
stripped_printed_text: Install Kyuban only on a piece of ice. Gain 2 credits whenever you pass host ice.

flavor:
"Breathe, girl. Breathe." Mike flickered into focus as she brushed Akiko's tears away. "What did you see?"
"I..." Akiko hesitated. "Everything."
printed_text: The first time each turn a successful run on R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card in R&D during that run.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn a successful run on R&D ends, you may gain 1 credit for each time you accessed a card in R&D during that run.

flavor: "When we're together, I feel like I can do anything!"
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 2[credit] to gain [click]. If you do, trash Algernon when your turn ends if you did not make a successful run this turn.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 2 credits to gain click. If you do, trash Algernon when your turn ends if you did not make a successful run this turn.

printed_text:
Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, install up to 5 cards from your heap facedown.
Remove this operation from the game.
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, install up to 5 cards from your heap facedown. Remove this operation from the game.

flavor: "So, Miriam, hear anything good lately?"
printed_text:
Reduce the play cost of Office Supplies by 1 for each [link] you have.
Gain 4[credit] or draw 4 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Reduce the play cost of Office Supplies by 1 for each link you have. Gain 4 credits or draw 4 cards.

printed_text: Host a g-mod identity that does not match the faction of your identity on DJ Fenris when he is installed. Remove hosted identity from the game if DJ Fenris is uninstalled. DJ Fenris gains the text of hosted identity. Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: Host a g-mod identity that does not match the faction of your identity on DJ Fenris when he is installed. Remove hosted identity from the game if DJ Fenris is uninstalled. DJ Fenris gains the text of hosted identity. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: Want It More.
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards.

flavor: "Our analysis shows significant support from both the public and private sectors."
printed_text: When Hyperloop Extension is scored or stolen, the Corp gains 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When Hyperloop Extension is scored or stolen, the Corp gains 3 credits.

flavor: You don't cross it—it crosses you.
printed_text: [subroutine] Gain 4[credit] and end the run unless the Runner adds Meridian to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Gain 4 credits and end the run unless the Runner adds Meridian to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

flavor: Banana who?
printed_text:
Gatekeeper has +6 strength if you rezzed it this turn.
[subroutine] Draw up to 3 cards. Reveal up to 3 agendas in HQ and/or Archives, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Gatekeeper has +6 strength if you rezzed it this turn. Subroutine Draw up to 3 cards. Reveal up to 3 agendas in HQ and/or Archives, then shuffle those agendas into R&D. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: If that doesn't work, try reversing the polarity.
printed_text: Derez any number of cards. You may rez a card, lowering its rez cost by 3 for each card that you derezzed this way.
stripped_printed_text: Derez any number of cards. You may rez a card, lowering its rez cost by 3 for each card that you derezzed this way.

flavor: "Oh, my! He's on fire!"
printed_text: Gain X[credit]. Draw up to X cards. Install up to X cards in the root of and/or protecting a single remote server. X is equal to the number of agendas in the Runner's score area.
stripped_printed_text: Gain X credits. Draw up to X cards. Install up to X cards in the root of and/or protecting a single remote server. X is equal to the number of agendas in the Runner's score area.

flavor: Coach Walden's pep talks were renowned for improving in direct proportion to the amount by which his team was losing.
printed_text: Gain [click] for each agenda in the Runner's score area. Remove Game Changer from the game instead of trashing it.
stripped_printed_text: Gain click for each agenda in the Runner's score area. Remove Game Changer from the game instead of trashing it.

flavor: The world changed. Concession prices did not.
printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, end the run unless the Runner pays 2[credit] for each agenda in his or her score area.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, end the run unless the Runner pays 2 credits for each agenda in his or her score area.

printed_text: [click], 1[credit]: Install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server, then place 1 advancement counter on it. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
stripped_printed_text: click, 1 credit: Install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server, then place 1 advancement counter on it. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.

flavor: "Jumon, all too Jumon..."
printed_text: When your turn ends, place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of a remote server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn ends, place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of a remote server.

flavor: "Supersedure is all part of our scheduled maintenance."
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove an advancement token from an installed card to gain 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove an advancement token from an installed card to gain 3 credits.

printed_text:
Neurostasis can be advanced.
If you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses Neurostasis, choose 1 installed Runner card for each advancement token on Neurostasis. The Runner must shuffle the chosen cards into the stack.
stripped_printed_text: Neurostasis can be advanced. If you pay 3 credits when the Runner accesses Neurostasis, choose 1 installed Runner card for each advancement token on Neurostasis. The Runner must shuffle the chosen cards into the stack.

flavor: "If the sysop offers you a link, it's because they want you to go there. But if you wanted to go where the sysop suggested, you wouldn't be trying to break in at all." -How Not to Get Fragged
printed_text: [subroutine] You may place up to 3 advancement tokens on a card installed in a server. If you do, the Runner accesses that card unless he or she pays 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You may place up to 3 advancement tokens on a card installed in a server. If you do, the Runner accesses that card unless he or she pays 3 credits.

flavor: Step right up!
printed_text:
When your turn begins and whenever the Runner passes this ice, you may swap this ice with another installed piece of ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins and whenever the Runner passes this ice, you may swap this ice with another installed piece of ice. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during his or her last turn.
Choose an installed Corp card. The Runner may access that card. If he or she does, remove Hangeki from the game instead of trashing it; otherwise, add Hangeki to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during his or her last turn. Choose an installed Corp card. The Runner may access that card. If he or she does, remove Hangeki from the game instead of trashing it; otherwise, add Hangeki to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

printed_text: When the Runner approaches this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 card in the root of another server or 1 agenda, asset, or upgrade in HQ. Swap that card with 1 card in the root of this server. If you swap cards this way, the Runner may jack out.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner approaches this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 card in the root of another server or 1 agenda, asset, or upgrade in HQ. Swap that card with 1 card in the root of this server. If you swap cards this way, the Runner may jack out.

printed_text: The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag (even if they have 0) during encounters with the outermost piece of ice protecting any server.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag (even if they have 0) during encounters with the outermost piece of ice protecting any server.

flavor: Only half as annoying as the real thing.
printed_text: When you score Fly on the Wall, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Fly on the Wall, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor:
"What's so special about the Special Investigations Unit?"
"Their budget, for starters."
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash SIU to <trace>trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash SIU to trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "I lost the staring contest. And all seven rematches." -Kabonesa Wu
printed_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains "[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag." for each revealed card of the chosen type.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains "Subroutine End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag." for each revealed card of the chosen type.

printed_text:
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Gain 5[credit] if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 3 net damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Gain 5 credits if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "No, the audio is fine. It just never seems to turn off."
printed_text: Install Eavesdrop on a piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Whenever the Runner encounters host ice, <trace>trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag."
stripped_printed_text: Install Eavesdrop on a piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Whenever the Runner encounters host ice, trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag."

flavor: "Good news, ma'am. The compliance training was completed with little resistance."
printed_text: Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2[credit] for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2 credits for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.

flavor: "Cheers, Philbert."
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored from this server, you may install a card from HQ, ignoring all costs, and place 1 advancement token on it.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored from this server, you may install a card from HQ, ignoring all costs, and place 1 advancement token on it.

flavor: We do things our way.
printed_text: Gain 3[credit] whenever you take at least 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 3 credits whenever you take at least 1 bad publicity.

printed_text: When you score Broad Daylight, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on Broad Daylight for each bad publicity you have. [click], hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Broad Daylight, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on Broad Daylight for each bad publicity you have. click, hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text: Place 3 power counters on Drudge Work when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Drudge Work, trash it. [click], hosted power counter: Reveal an agenda in HQ or Archives. Gain credits equal to its agenda points, then shuffle it into R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 power counters on Drudge Work when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Drudge Work, trash it. click, hosted power counter: Reveal an agenda in HQ or Archives. Gain credits equal to its agenda points, then shuffle it into R&D.

printed_text: Blockchain gains "[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]." before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. [subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Blockchain gains "Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit." before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: A place of decay and death, a plane out of phase, a place of monsters.
printed_text:
Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may rez this ice. If you do, move this ice to the innermost position protecting the approached server. The Runner moves to this ice and encounters it.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 2 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may rez this ice. If you do, move this ice to the innermost position protecting the approached server. The Runner moves to this ice and encounters it. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner suffers 2 net damage.

flavor: "It looks like a mistake but I'm pretty sure they leave the gaps on purpose." -Gnat
printed_text: Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs.

flavor: "This is blackmail!" "No, this is extortion."
printed_text:
Play only if you have fewer than 10[credit].
Gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you have fewer than 10 credits. Gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.

printed_text: Play only if the Runner accessed at least 1 card during his or her last turn. Trash 1 connection resource and take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner accessed at least 1 card during his or her last turn. Trash 1 connection resource and take 1 bad publicity.

printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. [click], [click], [click]: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. click, click, click: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
